survey_name: Remote Team Collaboration Tools Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the effectiveness and user experience of remote team collaboration tools used within organizations.

questions.question_text: Which remote team collaboration tools does your organization currently use?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for any tools not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional input.

script.question_text: Which remote team collaboration tools does your organization currently use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the remote team collaboration tools your organization provides?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.
